name: my-enterprise-da-stack
label: My Enterprise DA Stack
short_description: A single deployable architecture with multiple variations for base, Cognos, and App Connect.
long_description: This deployable architecture provides three options for deployment. You can choose the foundational infrastructure or add pre-configured integrations for Cognos or App Connect.

flavors.name: base
flavors.label: Base Infrastructure
flavors.short_description: Deploys the foundational VPC, networking, and security groups.

flavors.name: cognos
flavors.label: Base with Cognos
flavors.short_description: Deploys the base infrastructure plus a Cognos Analytics service.

flavors.name: appconnect
flavors.label: Base with App Connect
flavors.short_description: Deploys the base infrastructure plus an App Connect Enterprise service.
